workSummary: Worked on various components like scores, deployment table, and deployment failure sections for a reporting tool by embedding reliability team (ESRE).
Handled the chart section of a reporting tool using HighchartJS.
Created prototypes for reporting tool and chaos tool using UXPin (React) and Figma (Clarity Design).
Built custom tables inclusive of sorting, filtering, pagination, CRUD operations, and security measures.
Led frontend development for a cross-platform Chat App (2 versions) developed with pure JavaScript (v1) and React with Material UI (v2).
Ensured security compliance for the app with Blackduck.
Implemented WCAG modules to enhance accessibility for specially-abled users.
Developed and maintained the website and web app for Freshsales (a CRM product).
Established coding guidelines for HTML and CSS, implemented with linters.
Built various components in the app based on EmberJS, and added integration support for Trello and Docusign.
Created patterned responsive websites with SEO support for multiple product sites.
Implemented materialistic themes across product sites.
Developed plugins for infinite scroll, modals, sliders, alerts, and paginations.
Integrated various HTML5 APIs into applications.
Developed web applications for United Airlines using MVC Architecture.
Coded applications using JavaScript, KnockoutJS, AmplifyJS, and RequireJS.
